values.description:
We are an experienced & friendly team of Chartered Surveyors and Energy Assessors with excellent knowledge of property & market conditions in the City of Brighton & Hove, throughout East & West Sussex and beyond.

Our Services include Building Surveys; HomeBuyer Reports; Defect diagnosis; Valuations for Mortgage, Right To Buy Purchase, Probate, Tax, Matrimonial, Sale/Purchase and Development Appraisals as well as Leasehold Enfranchisement valuations and advice.

We can also be involved in Lease renewal & rent review, Schedules of Dilapidations and Schedules of Condition for commercial properties (Highly recommended if your business is taking a new lease on premises).

Finally we also provide Energy Performance Certificates on commercial properties as well as Party Wall advice.
values.name: Sussex Surveyors LLP
Hurstpierpoint College

values: Excellent academic & extra-curricular provision on an outstanding 140 acre campus
Choice of A Levels or IB for Sixth Form study
Outstanding pastoral care in a strong, caring community

values.description:
Hurstpierpoint College is an independent school offering outstanding day and boarding education for boys and girls aged 4 to 18 years.  Set in Sussex countryside just north of the South Downs, its 140 campus provides superb academic, sporting and cultural facilities.  Easy access from the M25/M23 network, Gatwick Airport and main London to Brighton railway services.

The core belief at Hurst is that education is all about pupils’ pursuit and achievement of personal bests - academic, extra-curricular and in their relationships with others. Through this Hurst pupils, properly guided and supported by the school, gain not only the best grades possible but also develop vital life skills, qualities and values.

We're Emberlane; a creative studio based out of Brighton in the United Kingdom. 

WHAT WE DO 
Creative direction, brand/identity development, graphic design, web design and web development. 

Whether the right solution involves developing your brand identity, designing a piece of literature for print or building your website, solutions are bespoke, project-specific and never off-the-shelf. 

We build lasting relationships and we're proud to have a growing list of satisfied clients.
values.name: Triple Yellow

values.description:
Urban Edge Environmental Consulting Ltd is a Brighton based ecology and environmental planning practice.  Our expertise lies at the interplay between environment and development. 

We advise public sector bodies across the UK on their environmental and sustainability duties, and assist private sector clients in designing cost effective solutions for sustainable development.
values.name: Urban Edge Environmental Consulting Ltd

values.description: We Kumar Metal Co. was established in the year 1965 with the sole aim of catering to the global building hardware industry. We are a internationally recognized manufacturer and exporter of superior quality building hardware products, which include door hardware, window and cabinet fittings etc. Complying the international quality standards, our products have earned us unflinching trust and positive response of our esteemed clients spread all across the globe. Our range includes brass door furniture, classical door handles, polished brass door handles, decorative door handles, black antique finish door handles, lever handle round rose, square lever door handles, zinc diecast cabinet handles, door stopper gate hook, polished brass numerals, brighton fastener, designer pull handle, fleur de lis handle, brass cabinet fittings, sash handle, etc. Located in the capital of Indian Brassware industry, Aligarh ( Uttar Pradesh, India), we are a professionally managed organization. Our vision to be a branded name in our domain makes us liable to manufacture best quality hardware products. Further, capitalizing upon our well laid infrastructure and team of expert professionals, we offer the clients satisfactory value added services like customized packaging, free sampling and on-time delivery etc. Our clients also count on us for their OEM and customized orders, owing to our capability to develop and ship new designs as per their specific requirements.
values.name: Kumar Metalco

values.description:
El Pelon Taqueria serves authentic Mexican street food in the heart of Boston, Massachusetts.  We strive to offer our menu items at extremely affordable prices, prepared with fresh ingredients daily . Our menu consists of more than just  burritos, we have award winning fish tacos and other Mexican specialties such as Enchiladas, Tortas and handmade Tamales. We provide fast and friendly service, allowing for quick, convenient take-out or dine in from 11am to 11pm seven days a week. Catering now available

values.description:
Founded in early 2012, Classic Consulting is now a well established, multi award winning, specialist recruitment agency that has rapidly made a genuine and significant impact in the Sussex business community.

Our founders are keen supporters of the Institute of Business Ethics which was established to encourage a strong ethics culture and high standards of business behaviour based on ethical values.

We work with a wide range of businesses of all sizes and sectors across the region on temporary, contract and permanent positions specialising in the following areas:

• Admin, secretarial, PA, legal
• HR, training, IT, business development
• Marketing, PR, digital, media
• Customer service, call centre, market research
• Professional and financial services, insurance, property
• Construction and Engineering

We're proud to be a Multi Award Winning, local Recruitment Consultancy

• Winner of 'New Business of the Year' at the 2013 NatWest Venus Awards, National Finals
• Winner of 'New Business of the Year' at the 2013 NatWest Venus Awards, Brighton
• Finalists for 'Best Customer Service' at the 2013 Sussex Business Awards
• Winner of 'Most Promising New Business' at the 2012 Sussex Business Awards
values.name: Classic Consulting

values.description:
Dolphin Languages is different to other language institutions. After interviewing hundreds of students who have studied in the UK we have a comprehensive understanding of what the customer wants and we know how to deliver it. We acknowledge that people have special language requirements and may want to learn quickly in an intensive and professional environment.

At Dolphin Languages we aim to meet this demand by offering English Language with specialist courses, executive courses, corporate courses. We can work on a consultation basis to design a course that’s absolutely perfect for an individual or a business.

We are also very proud of our courses for children which include stimulating lessons, exciting trips and sports or even business for the executives of tomorrow! Pastoral care is a number one priority on the junior programme and we make every effort to ensure that the students have contact with a social supervisor who can speak their native language. There are also lots of organised activities for the students including our fantastic English and Football programme at the Brighton Amex Stadium.

As well as this, Dolphin Languages offers foreign languages for businesses, school children and businesses based in the UK.
values.name: Dolphin Languages

values.description:
Mike's Auto Spas are full service car wash we offer exterior car wash starting at $5.00 and include a free vacuum along with a variety of interior cleaning services starting at $12.95. Our Detail Services start at $39.95 and can cost as much as $230.00 for our higher end restoration packages. We are located in the North Denver communities of Brighton and Westminster and are members of the International Watersavers Organization. At Mike's we focus on three main things. The first being the customers; we understand that the customer's trust and confidence are vital to the success of our business. Mike's will provide you with the best possible service everytime. Secondly, we are committed to social responsibility, a clean environment and the conservation of natural resources. Mike's Auto Spa is one of the Denver area's GREEN CAR WASH. We recycle 85% of the water that we use in our washes and use chemicals safely and prudently to ensure our impact on the environment is minimal. Finally, Mike's Auto Spa prides itself on being a member of the community. We share a responsibility to work for the betterment of our local communities. We also, actively support our local chamber of commerce,  schools, churches  and young adults. 

Mission Statement - 
"Mike’s Auto Spa will establish itself as a corporate citizen for the communities we work in by creating lifetime customers through the delivery of clean, fast, friendly experience through engaged and valued team members."
values.name: Mikes Auto Spa

values.description:
Based in Brighton, our friendly studio hosts a talented team of experienced people, working to produce exception design. We value every new client and project, applying our established principle of great work on time, on budget & on brief.

We’d love to discover more about you and your business to see how we can help. Please don’t hesitate to call us on 01273 777006 or email info@republiquedesign.co.uk
values.name: République Ltd

values.description:
Creators of the Mooncup (known in the USA as MCUK): the original silicone menstrual cup and a convenient, safe and eco-friendly alternative to tampons and sanitary pads. 

Mooncup Ltd. was established in 2002, with a mission to make women’s experience of menstruation more positive, healthy and eco-friendly. The Mooncup was designed from medical grade silicone to enable women with sensitive skin and particularly latex allergies to use it (earlier models were made from rubber). Mooncup Ltd., and particularly the Advice Centre nurses, are committed to researching menstrual health and to the advancement of education about this under-discussed subject that affects half the world’s population!

Based in Brighton, Mooncup Ltd today is a multi-award winning small business run entirely by  women, and collaborating with distributors all around the world. In 2004, Mooncup Ltd. was awarded Ethical Company status for its commitment to people and animal friendly practices, making it the first sanitary protection manufacturer in the world to be a certified ethical business.
values.name: Mooncup Ltd
